member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.AngleSwapChainPanel
member.summary: A SwapChainPanel that wraps an ANGLE OpenGL ES context.

member.name: C:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.AngleSwapChainPanel
member.summary: Creates a new instance of .

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.AngleSwapChainPanel.BackingOption
member.summary: Gets or sets the value for how the drawable surface retains its contents after displaying them.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.AngleSwapChainPanel.ContentsScale
member.summary: Gets or sets the scaling for the renderbuffer dimensions.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.AngleSwapChainPanel.Context
member.summary: Get or sets the ANGLE OpenGL ES context.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.AngleSwapChainPanel.DepthFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of the depth renderbuffer.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.AngleSwapChainPanel.DrawInBackground
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether drawing occurs on a background thread, or the main UI thread

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.AngleSwapChainPanel.EnableRenderLoop
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use a render loop, or on-demand rendering.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.AngleSwapChainPanel.Invalidate
member.summary: Invalidates the entire surface of the control and causes the control to be redrawn.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.AngleSwapChainPanel.Multisampling
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of the multisampling buffer.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.AngleSwapChainPanel.OnRenderFrame(Windows.Foundation.Rect)
member.summary: Called to draw the current frame within the passed-in rectangle.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.AngleSwapChainPanel.StencilFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of the stencil renderbuffer.

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.Extensions
member.summary: Various extension methods to convert between SkiaSharp types and platform types.

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesBackingOption
member.summary: Values for whether the drawable surface retains its contents after displaying them.

member.name: F:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesBackingOption.Detroyed
member.summary: The drawable surface may destroy its contents.

member.name: F:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesBackingOption.Retained
member.summary: The drawable surface retains its contents.

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesContext
member.summary: A object manages an ANGLE OpenGL ES rendering context.

member.name: C:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesContext
member.summary: Creates a new instance.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesContext.CurrentContext
member.summary: Gets or sets the current ANGLE OpenGL ES rendering context.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesContext.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this .
member.remarks: Always dispose the object before you release your last reference to the . Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the finalizer.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesContext.HasValidSurface
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current context has a valid rending surface.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesContext.Reset
member.summary: Resets the current context, and reinitializes it.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesContext.SetSurface(Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.SwapChainPanel,System.Int32,System.Int32,SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesBackingOption,SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesMultisampling,SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesRenderTarget)
member.param: The SwapChainPanel to use as the drawing surface.
The format of the multisampling buffer.
The ANGLE OpenGL ES binding point.
member.summary: Specifies that the current context should use the specified swap chain panel for the drawing surface.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesContext.SetViewportSize(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the current viewport to the specified dimensions.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesContext.SwapBuffers(SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesRenderTarget,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: The ANGLE OpenGL ES binding point.
member.summary: Swaps the buffers, displaying the renderbuffer's contents on screen.
member.returns: Returns true if the swap was successful, otherwise false.

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesDepthFormat
member.summary: The format of the depth renderbuffer.

member.name: F:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesDepthFormat.Format16
member.summary: A 16-bit depth entry for each pixel.

member.name: F:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesDepthFormat.Format24
member.summary: A 24-bit depth entry for each pixel.

member.name: F:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesDepthFormat.None
member.summary: The underlying framebuffer object has no depth buffer.

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesMultisampling
member.summary: The format of the multisampling buffer.

member.name: F:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesMultisampling.FourTimes
member.summary: Multisampling is enabled at 4x.

member.name: F:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesMultisampling.None
member.summary: Multisampling is not enabled.

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesRenderTarget
member.summary: The ANGLE OpenGL ES binding point for a currently bound renderbuffer.

member.name: F:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesRenderTarget.Renderbuffer
member.summary: The currently bound target is the renderbuffer.

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesStencilFormat
member.summary: The format of the stencil renderbuffer.

member.name: F:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesStencilFormat.Format8
member.summary: An 8-bit stencil entry for each pixel.

member.name: F:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.GlesStencilFormat.None
member.summary: The underlying framebuffer object has no stencil buffer.

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.SKSwapChainPanel
member.summary: A SwapChainPanel that can be drawn on using SkiaSharp drawing commands.

member.name: C:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.SKSwapChainPanel
member.summary: Creates a new instance of .

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.SKSwapChainPanel.ArrangeOverride(Windows.Foundation.Size)
member.param: The available size that this object can give to child objects. Infinity can be specified as a value to indicate that the object will size to whatever content is available.
member.summary: Provides the behavior for the "Measure" pass of the layout cycle. Classes can override this method to define their own "Measure" pass behavior.
member.returns: The size that this object determines it needs during layout, based on its calculations of the allocated sizes for child objects or based on other considerations such as a fixed container size.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.SKSwapChainPanel.CanvasSize
member.summary: Gets the current canvas size.
member.remarks: The canvas size may be different to the view size as a result of the current device's pixel density.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.SKSwapChainPanel.GRContext
member.summary: Gets the current GPU context.

member.param: The event arguments that contain the drawing surface and information.
member.summary: Implement this to draw on the canvas.

member.summary: Called to draw the current frame within the passed-in rectangle.

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.SKXamlCanvas
member.summary: A XAML canvas that can be drawn on using SkiaSharp drawing commands.

member.name: C:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.SKXamlCanvas
member.summary: Creates a new instance of .

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.SKXamlCanvas.CanvasSize
member.summary: Gets the current canvas size.
member.remarks: The canvas size may be different to the view size as a result of the current device's pixel density.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.SKXamlCanvas.Dpi
member.summary: Gets the current DPI for the canvas.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.SKXamlCanvas.IgnorePixelScaling
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the drawing canvas should be resized on high resolution displays.
member.remarks: By default, when , the canvas is resized to 1 canvas pixel per display pixel. When , the canvas is resized to device independent pixels, and then stretched to fill the view. Although performance is improved and all objects are the same size on different display densities, blurring and pixelation may occur.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.SKXamlCanvas.Invalidate
member.summary: Invalidates the entire surface of the control and causes the control to be redrawn.

member.param: The event arguments that contain the drawing surface and information.
member.summary: Implement this to draw on the canvas.

member.name: E:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.SKXamlCanvas.PaintSurface
member.summary: Occurs when the surface needs to be redrawn.

member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp color into a Windows color.

member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp point into a Windows point.

member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp rectangle into a Windows rectangle.

member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp size into a Windows size.

member.summary: Converts a Windows WriteableBitmap into a SkiaSharp bitmap.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a SkiaSharp bitmap.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.UWPExtensions.ToSKColor(Windows.UI.Color)
member.summary: Converts a Windows color into a SkiaSharp color.

member.summary: Converts a Windows WriteableBitmap into a SkiaSharp image.

member.param: The SkiaSharp pixmap to hold the copy of the bitmap data.
member.summary: Converts a Windows WriteableBitmap into a SkiaSharp pixmap.
member.returns: Returns if the copy was successful, otherwise .

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.UWPExtensions.ToSKPoint(Windows.Foundation.Point)
member.summary: Converts a Windows point into a SkiaSharp point.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.UWPExtensions.ToSKRect(Windows.Foundation.Rect)
member.summary: Converts a Windows rectangle into a SkiaSharp rectangle.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.UWPExtensions.ToSKSize(Windows.Foundation.Size)
member.summary: Converts a Windows size into a SkiaSharp size.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.UWPExtensions.ToWriteableBitmap(SkiaSharp.SKBitmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp bitmap into a Windows WriteableBitmap.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a Windows WriteableBitmap.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.UWPExtensions.ToWriteableBitmap(SkiaSharp.SKImage)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp image into a Windows WriteableBitmap.

member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a Windows WriteableBitmap.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the pixel data as a Windows WriteableBitmap.
